ul.li: Remote Monitoring of Asset: An example dashboard for remote monitoring of a machine
SPC Report: An example of performing SPC data analytics using the formulas
Historical Analytics: An example of how historical data and real time data can be used for various visualizations.
Failure Analysis: Using the system _Error Tag, data of when the machine went offline and recovered can be and analyzed
Data Summary : An overview of the data that are being forwarded
Trend Viewer: For trending a Tag
Data Exporter: Search and export your data in CSV or PDF
Channel: Channel being the channel name in the Kepware Configuration. In Kepware, the Channel is usually considered as the protocol of communication pathway.
Device: Device refers to the device created under the channel in Kepware. This is usually the actual device that is connected.
Tag: Tags are similar to variables in computing. In Kepware, Tags point to the memory space where the required data is located in the device.
TagName: The complete Tag alias in OPC. Channel.Device.Tag
QualityNum: Numeric Equivalent of OPC Quality. Bad = 0; Good = 192
